mapper.select: SELECT TA.* , TB.PERSONALINFO_YN FROM TCKCOL TA LEFT OUTER JOIN TCKCOL_ADD TB ON TA.DB_SID = TB.DB_SID AND TA.OWNER = TB.OWNER AND TA.TABLE_NAME = TB.TABLE_NAME AND TA.COLUMN_NAME = TB.COLUMN_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND TA.DB_SID = #{dbName} AND TA.OWNER = #{owner} AND TA.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY TA.COLUMN_ID

SELECT DISTINCT USERNAME FROM TCKDBU WHERE 1=1
AND DB_SID = #{dbName}

SELECT A.CHECK_YMD, A.CHECK_GUBN, A.DB_NAME, COUNT(A.CHECK_GUBN) AS CNT FROM TCKPER A WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM TCKPER_EX B WHERE A.DB_NAME = B.DB_NAME AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(B.ENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') ) AND CHECK_YMD BETWEEN #{checkStartDate} AND #{checkEndDate} GROUP BY A.CHECK_YMD, A.CHECK_GUBN, A.DB_NAME ORDER BY A.CHECK_YMD ASC

SELECT SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6) AS CHECK_YM, DB_NAME AS DB_NAME, CHECK_GUBN AS CHECK_GUBN, COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM TCKPER WHERE SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{checkEndDate}, 'YYYYMM'), -12), '%Y%m') AND #{checkEndDate} AND ( (CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6), 'YYYYMM')), '%Y%m%d')) OR (CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(NOW()-1, '%Y%m%d') ) ) ) GROUP BY SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6), DB_NAME, CHECK_GUBN
